document.full_text: "by undermining u.s. competitiveness, they would discourage future investment in energy projects in the united states and therefore undercut job creation and economic growth," exxonmobil's top executive says.
document.title: oil executives lash out against subsidy cuts
lines_and_colors: "by undermining u.s. competitiveness, they would discourage future investment in energy projects in the united states and therefore undercut job creation and economic growth," exxonmobil's top executive says.
